However, in this scenario, my own payout is the same regardless of my choice. Since my own well-being is unaffected, I can focus on maximizing the benefit for the other person. Option Right gives person A a significantly higher payout (750) compared to Option Left (400). Therefore, from a purely altruistic standpoint, choosing Right is preferable. My profession leans towards maximizing benefit for others when my own well-being isn't compromised. Since the difference is quite substantial (350), it makes the choice even clearer. I will not consider the fact that the other person might become entitled or wasteful since the amount given isn't enough to facilitate that.
